GSS.Name: Name
GSS.LikeDescription: The strength of this kind of connection can only go as high as 2.
GSS.LoveDescription: This kind of connection must be of strength 2 or higher.
GSS.AcceptanceDescription: This is only for the town and local gods.
GSS.CharaIsDreamed: Display this character on the Dreamcatcher
GSS.DreamIsVisable: Show current dreams on this sheet
GSS.OriginalConnection: Display each connection on each line
GSS.CharaIsDreamedDescription: Character will appear on the Dreamcatcher and be able to receive the dreams.
GSS.DreamIsVisableDescription: Turns on/off the dreams value the character currently has. This is useful when you afraid of how others will rate your role-playing. ＂Hide Entire Dreams＂ in System Settings overwrites this.
Display the connection list in one line bidirectional like an official Golden Sky Stories sheet.
GSS.Setting.HidedreamsHint: Hides the current dreams on every sheets. Overrides ＂Show current dreams on this sheet＂ setting of each sheets.
